greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number T(n,k) of ascent sequences of length n where the maximum of 0 and all letter multiplicities equals k; triangle T(n,k), n>=0, 0<=k<=n, read by rows.
maple: b:= proc(n, i, t, p, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1,
add(`if`(coeff(p, x, j)=k, 0, b(n-1, j, t+
mathematica: b[n_, i_, t_, p_, k_] := b[n, i, t, p, k] = If[n == 0, 1, Sum[If[ Coefficient[p, x, j] == k, 0, b[n - 1, j, t + If[j > i, 1, 0], p + x^j, k]], {j, t + 1}]];
Table[T[n, k], {n, 0, 10}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 29 2020, after Maple *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Oct 25 2017
